us.phonetic: /n. əˈtɛnʃən; interj. əˌtɛnˈʃʌn/, (n. ə ten′shən; interj. ə ten′shun′)

example.eg: The teacher made sure she had the students' attention before continuing.
example.egtrans: 在继续上课前，老师确保学生都保持注意力。

example.eg: Somehow that mistake escaped my attention; I'll correct it now.
example.egtrans: 不知为什么，我没注意到这个错误。我这就修改。

example.eg: The school's attention to my daughter's special needs has been excellent.
example.egtrans: 学校在对我女儿特殊需求的关注方面做得十分出色。

example.eg: Soldiers are required to stand to attention.

us.phonetic: /n. əˈtɛnʃən; interj. əˌtɛnˈʃʌn/, (n. ə ten′shən; interj. ə ten′shun′)

example.eg: The princess enjoyed the attentions of many suitors.

us.phonetic: /n. əˈtɛnʃən; interj. əˌtɛnˈʃʌn/, (n. ə ten′shən; interj. ə ten′shun′)
/n. əˈtɛnʃən; interj. əˌtɛnˈʃʌn/, (n. ə ten′shən; interj. ə ten′shun′)

example.eg: Children with attention deficit disorder have trouble concentrating.

dsense.name: attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多动症, 注意力缺陷多动症

example.eg: Most adults have an attention span of about 20 minutes.
One of the key differences between good service and top-notch service is in attention to detail.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 关注细节, 一丝不苟

example.eg: That certainly is an attention-getting outfit.
example.egtrans: 那绝对是一套引人注意的装束。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 哗众取宠的, 引人注意的
寻求注意的, 寻求关注的

example.eg: That new sports car is certain to attract attention.
I shouted across the room to try and attract attention.
example.egtrans: 我朝房间那头大喊，以尝试吸引注意力。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 引起…注意, 吸引…的注意力

dsense.name: bring [sth] to [sb]'s attention, bring [sth] to the attention of [sb]

example.eg: An employee brought the matter to my attention.
His manly voice caught my attention.

dsense.name: center of attention (US), centre of attention (UK)

example.eg: The photographer framed the photo in such a way as to ensure the flower was the centre of attention.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 众人瞩目的焦点, 众人瞩目之地

dsense.name: center of attention (US), centre of attention (UK)

example.eg: The painting was the centre of attention at the exhibition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 注意力的中心, 众人瞩目的焦点

dsense.name: come to the attention of [sb], come to [sb]'s attention

example.eg: It has come to the attention of management that many employees are using the computers to play games.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 引起...的关注, 吸引...的注意
引起注意, 吸引关注

example.eg: That child is constantly demanding attention.
Gun violence is a serious matter that demands attention.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 需要注意, 需要关注
转移注意力, 分散注意力

example.eg: Stop trying to detract our attention from what's really important.

dsense.name: direct attention to [sth/sb], direct [sb]'s attention to [sth/sb]

example.eg: I'd like to direct your attention to the graph at the top of Page 5 in the report.
example.egtrans: 我想将大家的注意力引向报告第5页顶部的图表。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…密切注意, 将注意力引向

example.eg: The boy distracted the woman's attention while his friend picked her pocket.
example.egtrans: 在朋友摸那位女士的包时，那个男孩负责转移她的注意力。

example.eg: The nurse talked to the baby to distract his attention from the injection.
example.egtrans: 护士跟宝宝聊天来让宝宝从注射一事上分心。

example.eg: Magicians need to know how to distract attention from what they are doing.
The Prime Minister's speech on immigration was an attempt to divert attention from more serious issues.
example.egtrans: 总理就移民问题的讲话是为了将民众的注意力从更严重的问题上转移开来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使分心, 转移...上的注意力

example.eg: The study investigates the influence of divided attention on the performance of car drivers.
Garish clothing draws attention.
example.egtrans: 华美的衣物能吸引人的注意力。

example.eg: Bold text is used to draw attention to certain words.
example.egtrans: 粗体是用来让人们注意某些单词的。

dsense.name: draw [sb]'s attention, draw the attention of [sb]

example.eg: The street entertainer drew the attention of a large crowd.
example.egtrans: 那位街头艺人引来了一大群人的注意。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 注意力中心, 兴趣集中点

example.eg: The focus of our attention should be on how we can help.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 某人注意力的中心, 某人最感兴趣的事
由...收信, 由...处理, 致

example.eg: The movie had an entertaining beginning, but it failed to hold the attention of the audience for the entire ninety minutes.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使人集中注意力, 让人感兴趣

example.eg: You must pay meticulous attention to the instructions, as I will only state them once.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一丝不苟, 精益求精

example.eg: Pay attention!  Don't keep reading when I'm talking to you!
Please pay attention to this important information.
Pay close attention to every word he says.
Pay attention to me when I'm trying to tell you something important.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 注意听…说, 注意听…的话

example.eg: I was paying close attention but I still have no idea how the magician lifted your watch!
Pay close attention to what I say because I won't repeat it.
Pay no attention to the man behind the curtain.
Pay no attention to his rudeness.
The math teacher said we should pay special attention to the negative signs.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 特别留意, 特别关注

example.eg: The boy's selective attention helped him ignore his parents' calls.

dsense.name: stand at attention, stand to attention

example.eg: The entire company stood to attention in perfect unison.
I want your undivided attention while I go through the rules.
